sections.text:
49-1466.Dissolved candidate committee; unexpended funds; how treated.

Any person, who after being a candidate for office dissolves the candidate committee as provided in section 49-1453, may transfer any unexpended funds from such committee to another candidate committee, a political party committee, or a tax-exempt charitable institution or may return such unexpended funds to the contributors of the funds upon dissolution of the candidate committee.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 987, ยง 66;Laws 2000, LB 438, ยง 8.
